#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

void spiral(int n)
{
  int arr[100][100];
  int up, down, left, right;
  up = down = n/2;
  left = right = (n-1)/2;
  int i = up, j = left;
  int num = 1;
  while(true)
  {
    right++;
    for(;j < right;j++)
      arr[i][j] = num++;
    if(n%2 == 1 && right == n)
      break;
    up--;
    for(;i > up; i--)
      arr[i][j] = num++;
    left--;
    for(;j > left;j--)
      arr[i][j] = num++;
    if(n%2 == 0 && left == -1)
      break;
    down++;
    for(;i < down;i++)
      arr[i][j] = num++;
  }
  for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
  {
    for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
      cout<<arr[i][j]<<" ";
    cout<<"\n";
  }
}

int main()
{
  int n;
  cin>>n;
  spiral(n);
  return 0;
}
